definition: Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
jade
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
surname Xue
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Not far from the city are the snowy Yulong Mountain and the Tiger Leaping Gorge.
sentences.chinese: 离城不远处有玉龙雪山和虎跳峡。

sentences.english: I was frozen solid by the snow on Yulong Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我在玉龙雪山上被冻僵了。

sentences.english: I loved my trip to the Yu Long Mountain. I will never forget it!
sentences.chinese: 我爱玉龙雪山之旅，我永远都不会忘记它。

sentences.english: Gorgeous Yu Long Xue Shan sets the background for the sea of relgious flags.
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的玉龙雪山，为五彩经幡旗当背景。

sentences.english: Mount Yulong is also a glacier closest to the equator in the world.
sentences.chinese: 玉龙雪山还是全球距赤道最近的冰川。

sentences.english: The water house is a private house, located at the foot of snow mountain Yulong in Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 淼庐是一座私人住宅，位于在丽江玉龙雪山脚下。

sentences.english: The last place we'll visit is Yulong Snowmountain.
sentences.chinese: 我们要参观的最后一个地方是玉龙雪山。

sentences.english: A total of 90 species were found in the soil samples of the Yulong Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在玉龙雪山共鉴定到90种土壤纤毛虫。

sentences.english: I have never been to Jade Dragon Snow Mountain, and I hope I can visit there soon.
sentences.chinese: 我从未去过玉龙雪山，希望能早日前去。

definition: Meilixue or Meri snow mountains, with peaks up to 6000 m., in Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1 sha1 jiang1] in Lijiang Naxi autonomous county 麗江納西族自治縣|丽江纳西族自治县[Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Yunnan
Lugu Lake
Lijiang old town (in Yunnan)
Mt Haba (Nakhi: golden flower), in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Erhai Lake
Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
Cangshan county in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong
Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet

Shangri-La (mythical location)/Shangri-La town and county in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan/formerly Gyeltang or Gyalthang, Chinese 中甸[Zhong1 dian4] in Tibetan province of Kham
Lake Mibgai Co or Miga Tso, in Dartsendo or Kangding 康定[Kang1 ding4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
Mt Kawakarpo (6740 m) in Yunnan, the highest peak of Meri snow mountains 梅里雪山[Mei2 li3 xue3 shan1]
Yamdrok Lake, Tibet
Baimaxue mountains, up to 5430 m., in Dechen or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

Gyeltang or Gyalthang town and county, former name of Shangri-La county 香格里拉縣|香格里拉县[Xiang1 ge2 li3 la1 xian4] in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan
Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州 in Yunnan
judicial officer/justice of the peace (old)
